an5.168:1.1: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi:
an5.168:1.3: sammasamadhimhi asati sammasamadhivipannassa hatupanisam hoti yathabhutananadassanam;
an5.168:1.4: yathabhutananadassane asati yathabhutananadassanavipannassa hatupaniso hoti nibbidavirago;
an5.168:1.5: nibbidavirage asati nibbidaviragavipannassa hatupanisam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an5.168:1.7: Tassa papatikapi na paripurim gacchati, tacopi pheggupi saropi na paripurim gacchati.
an5.168:1.8: Evamevam kho, avuso, dussilassa silavipannassa hatupaniso hoti sammasamadhi;
an5.168:1.9: sammasamadhimhi asati sammasamadhivipannassa hatupanisam hoti yathabhutananadassanam;
an5.168:1.10: yathabhutananadassane asati yathabhutananadassanavipannassa hatupaniso hoti nibbidavirago;
an5.168:1.11: nibbidavirage asati nibbidaviragavipannassa hatupanisam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an5.168:2.1: Silavato, avuso, silasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammasamadhi;
an5.168:2.2: sammasamadhimhi sati sammasamadhisampannassa upanisasampannam hoti yathabhutananadassanam;
an5.168:2.3: yathabhutananadassane sati yathabhutananadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidavirago;
an5.168:2.4: nibbidavirage sati nibbidaviragasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti vimuttinanadassanam.
an5.168:2.5: Seyyathapi, avuso, rukkho, sakhapalasasampanno. Tassa papatikapi paripurim gacchati, tacopi pheggupi saropi paripurim gacchati.
an5.168:2.6: Evamevam kho, avuso, silavato silasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammasamadhi;
an5.168:2.7: sammasamadhimhi sati sammasamadhisampannassa upanisasampannam hoti yathabhutananadassanam;
an5.168:2.8: yathabhutananadassane sati yathabhutananadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidavirago;
an5.168:2.9: nibbidavirage sati nibbidaviragasampannassa upanisasampannam hoti vimuttinanadassanan”ti.
